question: Which statement about private transportation use is most accurate?

options.A: More than half of students use private transportation.
options.B: More than one-third of students use private transportation.
options.C: About 30% of students use private transportation.
options.D: Use of public and private transportation is about the same.

explanation: The grey slice (Private) is 30%, which is less than one-third. The misleading angle suggests private is the majority, but the green Public slice (70%) is actually the majority.
